title: Lun*na Menoh
text:
Lun*na Menoh is a Japanese-born visual artist, fashion designer and musician who lives in <a href="Los%20Angeles">Los Angeles</a>. In the early 2000s Lun*na partnered with Sukho Lee for the band <a href="Seksu%20Roba">Seksu Roba</a>, created the musical entity Jean Paul Yamamoto and currently performs with Saori Mitome as <a href="Les%20Sewing%20Sisters">Les Sewing Sisters</a>. In 2019 Les Sewing Sisters held a musical tour through 22 closets of private homes in Los Angeles.
Since the early 1990s she has presented work at Los Angeles art spaces and unique venues including <a href="Beyond%20Baroque%20Literary%20Arts%20Center">Beyond Baroque</a>, <a href="Track%2016%20Gallery">Track 16 Gallery</a>, <a href="Velaslavasay%20Panorama">Velaslavasay Panorama</a>. <a href="South%20Coast%20Plaza">South Coast Plaza</a> and the defunct Culver City venue Royal/T. She moved to Los Angeles from <a href="Japan">Japan</a> in 1989 and is married to author and publisher <a href="Tosh%20Berman">Tosh Berman</a>.
